message

Class MessageManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • message.MessageManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IManager, java.io.Serializable

    public class MessageManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, IManager
    The MessageManager class stores and modifies Message instances
    See Also:

        public void sendMessage(java.lang.String sender,
                        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> recipients,
                        java.lang.String message,
                        boolean isRequest)
        Sends a Message from a given User to an ArrayList of User recipients
        Parameters:
        sender - The User that sends the message
        recipients - The ArrayList of User that receives the message
        message - The String message being sent
        isRequest - boolean telling if the message is a request
